name: command-line-args
description: A mature, feature-complete library to parse command-line options.

scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:esm && npm run test:js-internals
scripts.test:js-internals: rollup test/internals/*.mjs -f cjs -e 'test-runner,assert,lodash.camelcase' --dir tmp/bundles/internals && test-runner tmp/bundles/internals/argv-parser.js tmp/bundles/internals/option-default.js tmp/bundles/internals/option-definitions.js tmp/bundles/internals/option-flag.js tmp/bundles/internals/option.js tmp/bundles/internals/output.js
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md -c jsdoc.conf index.mjs > doc/API.md && jsdoc2md -c jsdoc.conf lib/option-definition.mjs > doc/option-definition.md
scripts.dist: rollup index.mjs -f cjs -e 'lodash.camelcase' -o dist/index.js && rollup index.mjs -f esm -e 'lodash.camelcase' -o dist/index.mjs

author: Lloyd Brookes <75pound@gmail.com>
